articles.title: News24 | Teeger drama sees SA Jewish Board call for ICC intervention, Cricket SA meeting ends in stalemate
articles.description: The South African Jewish Board of Deputies is hoping the ICC will intervene in the David Teeger captaincy matter after their meeting with Cricket South Africa didn't go as planned.
articles.content: The South African Jewish Board of Deputies is hoping the ICC will intervene in the David Teeger captaincy matter after their meeting with Cricket South Africa didn't go as planned.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
